animeDescription: Based on Bandai's trading figure battle game.  The story of Battle Break is set 100 years into the future, when four superpowers - Earth's mechanized Empire, the fused hybrid beast/human resistance fighters of Gaia, the genetically engineered creatures of Coeurl, and the galactic Alien alliance - clash in the solar system.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Kurahashi Shizuo', ['Sound Effects']], ['Satou Miyuki', ['Color Design']], ['Kohama Toshihiro', ['Art Director']]]
